#summary How to install the plugin.

= Steps =

  # Download the latest plugin from the [http://code.google.com/p/netbeans-processing-template/downloads/list Downloads page]
  # Open Netbeans
  # Go to Tools > Plugins
  # Click the "Downloaded" tab
  # Click the "Add Plugins..." button
  # Select the plugin that you downloaded in step (1)
  # Select that plugin in the pane on the left, and click the "Install" button below
  # Done!
